description: Growing up, when Diarra Kilpatrick watched murder mystery shows with her grandmother, she never saw Black women driving the narrative. She seeks to change that in her new new BET+ series.
title: A first date turns into a whodunit in 'Diarra from Detroit'

description: Alabama could soon have a U.S. House delegation that more closely matches its diversity after a redistricting lawsuit. For Black voters, the change has greater significance than who holds the seat.
title: In new congressional district, Black voters weigh what representation really means

description: Sinister and visually stunning, the new Netflix series Ripley reminds us why Patricia Highsmith's book The Talented Mr. Ripley continues to influence popular culture.
title: Why Patricia Highsmith's most famous creature, Tom Ripley, continues to fascinate

description: Thursday's first song in 13 years leads off this edition of 8 Tracks, which we'll have to call 10 Tracks because there's been too much good music lately.
title: 8 Tracks: Post-hardcore band Thursday returns, plus glammy metal and skate-punk
